content:
Here is a PlantUML code to represent the sequence diagram of the attack:
```plantuml
@startuml
actor Attacker
entity Server
database AWS
entity WAF

Attacker -> Server : SSRF Attack
Server -> WAF : Relay request
WAF -> AWS : Access metadata service
AWS -> WAF : Return temporary credentials
WAF -> Server : Provide temporary credentials
Server -> Attacker : Send temporary credentials
Attacker -> AWS : Use credentials to list S3 buckets
AWS -> Attacker : Return list of S3 buckets
Attacker -> AWS : Copy data from S3 buckets
AWS -> Attacker : Send copied data
@enduml
```
To visualize the sequence diagram, paste this code into an online PlantUML renderer like [PlantUML Server](http://www.plantuml.com/plantuml/uml) or use a PlantUML-compatible software on your local machine.
